raw_text: PERERA – NIHAL (N.M.J.T.) (Rtd. Telecom Engineer). Deary beloved husband of Sunil (Singithi Nursery Nugegoda),​ darling father of Dimuthi & Anil,​ Malik & Enakshi,​ Dinali & Ranil,​ loving grandfather of Nimasha,​ Nirusha,​ Anarkalee,​ Nevaan & Kavinda,​ muththa to Liaa,​ Desh & Aanvi. Remains lie at 132/​3,​ Stanley Tillakaratne Mw.,​ Nugegoda till Thursday,​ 7th & thereafter cortege leaves residence at 10.00 a.m. for Cinnamon Gardens Baptist Church followed by Thanksgiving Service at 2.30 p.m. Cremation at General Cemetery Kanatta (Old Crematorium) at 5.00 p.m.080451
